short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have CADEsport control your music while riding.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CADEsport Music Control lets you ride and socialize all while listening to music without either the music or people talking getting in the way. CADEsport Music Control works only in conjunction with the CADEsport game.  

Use CADEsport Music Control because:
•	You want to enjoy talking with another player without having to adjust your music volume
•	A fellow Cader is playing their music loudly and you can't hear them speak
•	You would like your song to pause when you or others are speaking
•	It's free!
